name: Bad Influence
description: A digially created horror themed artwork.  Many children have imaginary friends, but when that imaginary friend doesn't go away as the child gets older, perhaps you should start to worry.  In this scene, a pale young woman, teddy bear in hand, stands in her nightgown in front of a dark forest.  A short, creepy monster with buggy eyes stands next to her with one arm wrapped around the girl and the other pointing at you, the viewer.  A white cat with grey spots peeks out from behind the girl.  Somewhat inspired by  Grant Wood's "American Gothic"
